revision.comment: Omega moved page [[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter X]] to [[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter X (ER-X)]]
revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Ubiquiti Networks |model=EdgeRouter |revision=X (ER-X) |upc=810354022197 |asin=B011N1IT2A,B00YFJT29C |price=49 |est_release_date=04/2015 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |availability=now |type=router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=ns |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7621AT |cpu1_cspeed=880 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34ML02G200TFI00 |fla2=2 |fla2_brand=CFeon (Eon) |fla2_model=EN25QH16-104GIP |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CB128M16FP-DI |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, unpopulated,, J2 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, (57600,8,N,1),, J3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=1MHz, 2A Synchronous Rectified Buck Converter;uPI Semi;uP1713;;1; ,,, 3A, 4.5-27V Simple Buck Regulator;Alpha & Omega (Α&Ω);AOZ1212;;1; ,,, 60V N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega (Α&Ω);AON7446;;1; ,,, 60V P-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega (Α&Ω);AO4421;;1; ,,, 2A Schottky Barrier Rectifier;Diodes Inc;B260/A;;1; |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.3;Ralink;v4.3.S.0; |stock_os=Linux;3.10.14-UBNT;EdgeOS;v1.6.6 based on Vyatta Core/Debian 7.8; |tp_firmware=Padavan (unofficially) |flags=PoE in, |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=ubnt |default_pass=ubnt |oui_eth=04:18:D6 }} {{TagLine|Advanced Gigabit Ethernet Router}} :[https://www.ubnt.com/edgemax/edgerouter-x/ Product page] (ER-X) {{•}} [https://www.ubnt.com/edgemax/edgerouter-x-sfp/ Product page] (ER-X-SFP) [http://dl.ubnt.com/datasheets/edgemax/EdgeRouter_X_DS.pdf Datasheet] {{•}} [http://dl.ubnt.com/guides/edgemax/EdgeRouter_ER-X_QSG.pdf Quick Start Guide] {{•}} [https://www.ubnt.com/download/edgemax/edgerouter-x/er-x/er-e50v1664749363tar# GPL Firmware Source] ===Specifications=== *[http://community.ubnt.com/t5/EdgeMAX/The-new-EdgeRouter-X-and-EdgeRouter-X-SFP/td-p/1222426/ ''The new EdgeRouter X and EdgeRouter X SFP'' on '''UBNT''' forums] *[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/ubiquiti/ubiquiti_edgerouter_x_er-x_ka ''Ubiquiti EdgeRouter ER-X/ER-X-SFP'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] (bootlog) *[http://www.bhphotovideo.com/c/product/1139738-REG/ubiquiti_networks_er_x_edgerouter_x_5_port_single.html#Specification ''Ubiquiti EdgeRouter X'' Specification on '''bhphotovideo.com'''] *[http://lanmarket.ua/stats/obzor-routera-EdgeRouter-X-ot-Ubiquiti-Networks ''Ubiquiti EdgeRouter X'' Review on '''LanMarket'''] (images) ===See also=== *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter X]] (ER-X) - [[MediaTek MT7621AT]] *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter X SFP]] (e50) - [[MediaTek MT7621AT]] *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter LITE]] (ERLite-3) - [[Cavium]] CN5020 *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter POE]] (ERPoe-5) - [[Cavium]] CN5020 *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter PRO]] (ERPro-8) - [[Cavium]] CN6120 *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter (ER-8)]] (e200) - [[Cavium]] CN6120 *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter Infinity (ER-8-XG)]] - [[Cavium]] CN7360 *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter 6P (ER-6P)]] - [[Cavium]] CN7130 *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter 4 (ER-4)]] - [[Cavium]] CN7130 ===Serial===
